content.rendered:
The World #1 Shopping Cart Migration Expert
Powering up your online store with a new platform is now much easier, faster and more accurate with LitExtension. Having delivered 200,000+ successful cart migration projects, we are proud to be the #1 provider of shopping cart migration service.

How to Perform eCommerce Platform Migration

• Step 1: Set-up Source Cart and Target Cart
Select “Source Cart” and “Target Cart” from the dropdown list. Afterward, enter store URL and follow brief instructions to set up the shopping cart migration process.
• Step 2: Select Data You Want To Migrate Cart to Cart
Choose the entities you want within the eCommerce site migration such as products, categories, orders, customer passwords, SEO URLs, and even more.
• Step 3: Perform Full ECommerce Replatforming
Let’s start the eCommerce data migration Once the migration process is kicked off, it will constantly run even when you turn off your browser.

Benefits

LitExtension is built for everyone, both store owners and agencies:
  • Cart to Cart Migration Made Easy:Only 3 simple steps to set everything up. No coding required!
  • 100% Uptime:Keep your business going steadily during the migration. No sales lost.
  • Highest Security Level:Your data is completely protected with several security policies throughout the cart to cart migration
App details
